alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Madison; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 21 at 4:20PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF NORTHEASTERN FAYETTE, NORTHWESTERN PICKAWAY AND SOUTHEASTERN MADISON COUNTIES THROUGH 445 PM EDT... At 420 PM EDT, a strong thunderstorm was located near Bloomingburg, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Hail may cause minor damage to outdoor objects. Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Mount Sterling, South Bloomfield, Williamsport, Bloomingburg, New Holland, Darbyville, Deer Creek Lake, Chenoweth, Derby, Madison Mills, State Route 207 at US Route 22, Big Plain and Pancoastburg. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
